page.title: 07INN-UMBERLEIGH
page.content: THE RISING SUN INN UMBERLEIGH The Rising Sun Inn is open at 11am to 2.30pm and 6pm-11pm on week days. On Sundays the opening hours are 12 noon to 2pm and 7pm-10.30pm. You can buy beer, spirits,wine,soft drinks and snacks there. There are normally approx 60 customers a day. The Inn was built in the 14th century. It has since been extended. The interior walls of the bar room are decorated with many photographs of fishermen and their catches from the River Taw which is just across the road from the inn.
